backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and video/note bookmark storage with permission checks and admin/user access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI modification features, affected files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose, behavior, and UI roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text color rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app by mounting main.tsx into the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all app routes, splash screen handling, and root layout wrapped in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors, logs them, and displays a reloadable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/AppLogo.tsx: Logo component that loads the primary PNG logo with automatic fallback to a backup image on load failure.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication button component handling login/logout via Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with Nepali labels that highlights the active route and provides quick navigation to key pages.
frontend/src/components/CourseImageCarou: Implements an auto-advancing image carousel with manual navigation and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/DriveViewer.tsx: Embeds Google Drive files or folders with fallback handling and supports offline saving and external opening.
frontend/src/components/SoundPlayer.tsx: Simple audio player that auto-plays a bell sound when triggered and notifies on end.
frontend/src/components/TopicVideoList.t: Displays categorized video topics with selection highlighting and bookmarking support.
frontend/src/components/YouTubePlayer.ts: Renders a responsive YouTube iframe supporting video, live, and playlist URLs.
frontend/src/content/exams.ts: Defines exam sets with metadata such as titles, durations, and associated Drive URLs.
frontend/src/content/gk.ts: Provides General Knowledge subject configuration including notes and categorized YouTube video topics.
frontend/src/content/iq.ts: Provides IQ subject configuration containing multiple categorized video topics.
frontend/src/content/oldQuestions.ts: Lists past exam questions by paper with optional Drive URLs and coming-soon markers.
frontend/src/content/secondPaper.ts: Defines subject configs for office management and constitution, listing topics with associated video links and notes URLs.
frontend/src/content/syllabus.ts: Exports an array of syllabus link objects for different provinces and combined syllabi.
frontend/src/content/thirdPaper.ts: Defines subject config for service management, including multiple topics with video resources and notes URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages video and note bookmarks with local storage and syncs them to the backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Provides a countdown timer hook with start, stop, reset, and formatted time output.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and exposing auth state to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, and updates app notifications in local storage with unread count management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineLibrary.ts: Handles an offline library of saved items, supporting add, remove, and persistence via local storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables, adds utility animations, and applies global background and typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with course sections, subject shortcuts, a header with search and notifications, and a carousel.
frontend/src/pages/Exam.tsx: Implements mock exam flow including exam selection, timer handling, viewing exam files, and displaying completion UI.
frontend/src/pages/NotesBookmarks.tsx: Displays bookmarked notes with delete controls and navigation, using bookmark state from a custom hook.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Lists categorized notifications, marking items as read when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineLibrary.tsx: Shows offline-saved items with options to open or remove them.
frontend/src/pages/OldQuestions.tsx: Renders old exam questions with tabbed papers and opens selected items in a Drive viewer.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a full‑screen animated splash screen with logo and branding text.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectContent.tsx: Shows subject videos, notes, and search with a resizable layout and bookmark support.
frontend/src/pages/Syllabus.tsx: Lists syllabus items and opens selected ones in a Drive viewer with a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/VideoBookmarks.tsx: Displays and filters bookmarked videos with delete actions and navigation controls.
frontend/src/types/content.ts: Defines interfaces for videos, topics, and subject configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoSearch.ts: Filters topics and videos based on a case‑insensitive keyword search.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors via CSS variables, extended animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including app requirements, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature definitions for an exam‑prep mobile app.
